content: {"name": "Oak Ridge Baptist Church", "alternate_name": "", "description": "The Shekinah Food Ministry has been serving our community since 2001. This institution is an equal opportunity provider. Food distribution times are as follows, the 3rd Thursday of each month and the Monday prior to the 3rd Thursday, beginning at 1:30 pm until 4:00 pm. Food is distributed at the Smith Hall Fellowship Building located at 7262 Rhodhiss Rd, Connelly Springs, NC.", "email": "", "url": "http://oakridgebaptistchurch.net/oak_ridge_baptist_church_ministries/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "7449 Oak Ridge Church Road", "address_2": null, "city": "Connelly Springs", "state_province": "NC", "postal_code": "28612", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 35.7542394, "longitude": -81.4794768}, "phones": [{"number": "(828) 874-0891", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "17:30", "closes_at": "20:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "05:30", "closes_at": "20:00"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "06:00", "closes_at": ""}]}
